oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Arthur Godfrey Time - 1948-11-24 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of radio program Arthur Godfrey Time, originally broadcast 1948-11-24. Featuring Arthur Godfrey with guest Gene Autry, promoting Gene's special Thanksgiving broadcast the following day (1948-11-25). This is an incomplete home recording of the program.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Arthur Godfrey and Gene Autry talk -- Chesterfield Cigarettes commercial (Arthur Godfrey) -- [interruption] -- Arthur Godfrey and Gene Autry talk
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; Arthur Godfrey time (Radio program); Godfrey, Arthur, 1903-1983; Bleyer, Archie; Autry, Gene, 1907-1998;
